name: Shambles
description:
Shambles is a tiny text game about holding on to your humanity even in horrible circumstances.

How to Play:
You can play it right here in your browser.
If you want to download it, double click on the file called "index.html" and it should open in your browser as well.
You only need your mouse or touchscreen; alternatively you can also use the TAB & ENTER keys on your keyboard.
